message: I propose a fair split. You get 10%, I get 90%. It's a good start, let's see if we can agree.
Your offer was quite unbalanced. Let's be more reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think a 55/45 split is a more equitable solution. It's a compromise that shows we're both willing to be flexible.
We're getting closer. I'm willing to compromise further with a 51/49 split.
